4Suite™ API Documentation

► Module Ft.Xml.Xslt.OutputParameters

Represents XSLT output parameters governed by the xsl:output instruction See also Ft.Xml.Xslt.OutputHandler
Copyright 2003 Fourthought, Inc. (USA).
Detailed license and copyright information: http://4suite.org/COPYRIGHT
Project home, documentation, distributions: http://4suite.org/
Classes:
OutputParameters
Globals:
FT_EXT_NAMESPACE

Classes

class OutputParameters

Methods

__init__(self)
avtParse(self, owner, context)
evaluates the given node for valid xsl:output-like attributes expressed in AVTs of extension elements, storing the values in instance variables. If called repeatedly, it will overwrite old values.
clone(self)
parse(self, owner)
parses the given node (owner) for valid xsl:output attributes and stores their values in instance variables. If called repeatedly, it will overwrite old values (this ensures behavior mandated by the spec, in which the last xsl:output element is established with highest precedence).
setDefault(self, attr, value)

Globals

FT_EXT_NAMESPACE = 'http://xmlns.4suite.org/ext'
